
# iBorrow short data
  * To fetch short data from https://www.iborrowdesk.com/report/Ticker , eliminate duplicated available number, only keep the first one

## Sample fetch steps to show condensed result
  * run iborrow command text records only
    ~~~bash
    iborrow rily text only
    ~~~
    - condensed result from old to new in pure text
~~~bash
ðŸ“Š RILY Borrow Data (Real-Time):
DateTime  , Available,  Fee
0728 08:49:40 ,   80000,  12.1%
0728 09:05:11 ,  150000,  12.1%
0728 10:07:12 ,   85000,  11.8%
0728 11:09:11 ,  100000,  11.8%
0728 11:40:11 ,  150000,  11.7%
0729 08:48:06 ,  100000,  11.5%
0729 11:23:11 ,  300000,  10.6%
0730 08:47:57 ,  100000,  10.3%
0730 09:03:30 ,  200000,  10.3%
0731 08:47:46 ,   45000,  10.5%
0731 09:03:16 ,   75000,  10.5%
0731 09:18:47 ,   40000,   9.9%
0801 08:48:28 ,   95000,   9.9%
0801 09:03:58 ,  150000,   9.9%
0801 14:29:56 ,  100000,  10.1%
0801 16:18:34 ,  150000,  10.1%
~~~

   * run iborrow command text records in grid only
    ~~~bash
    iborrow rily grid only
    ~~~
    - condensed result from old to new in grid
    ![Grid Demo](/img/docs/iborrow_rily_grid.jpg)  

   * run iborrow command plot and candle charts by default
    ~~~bash
    iborrow rily
    ~~~
    - condensed result plot and candle chart
    ![Plot Demo](/img/docs/iborrow_rily.png)
   
   * Note: only one or none records will do text only, trading time from 8am to 6pm , refresh 10m in a row
   
## Original Sample visit from web
  * open browser visit https://www.iborrowdesk.com/report/RILY
  - result (lots duplicated numbers from different timestamp)
